value.name: Florida officer who shot librarian in drill had prior issues
value.description: Lee Coel, 28, fatally shot Mary Knowlton at a police citizen academy. The police department says the gun was supposed to have blanks. David Begnaud reports from Punta Gorda.

value.name: Former Minnesota Woman Killed In Police Demonstration
value.description: Ashley Roberts reports on the “horrific accident” that left 73-year-old Mary Knowlton dead (2:04). WCCO 4 News At Noon – Aug. 10, 2016

value.name: Punta Gorda Shooting Leaves Family Reeling
value.description: The Son of police volunteer Mary Knowlton says he doesn't know how he'll cope with the loss of his mother after she was killed by a police officer in a training demonstration Tuesday. WBBH's Lucas ...
